晦ます: (くらます) - to abscond/to conceal oneself; to deceive/to dissemble/to fool
晦む: (くらむ) - to be dazzled by/to be dizzied by/to be disoriented by; to be lost in (greed, lust, etc.); to become dark
晦日: (つごもり) - last day of the month
晦日そば: (みそかそば) - soba eaten at the end of the month (esp. at the end of the year)
晦日蕎麦: (みそかそば) - soba eaten at the end of the month (esp. at the end of the year)
晦朔: (かいさく) - last and first days of the month
晧々: (こうこう) - bright (esp. of the moon); (こうこう only) broad and empty
晧晧: (こうこう) - bright (esp. of the moon); (こうこう only) broad and empty
晨朝: (じんちょう) - around six o'clock AM; dawn service
晩い: (おそい) - (遅い, 鈍い only) slow; late (e.g. "late at night"); (遅い, 鈍い only) too late; (遅い, 鈍い only)  dull/stupid
晩さん会: (ばんさんかい) - banquet; dinner party
晩冬: (ばんとう) - late winter; twelfth month of the lunar calendar
晩夏: (ばんか) - late summer; sixth month of the lunar calendar
晩成: (ばんせい) - late completion; a late bloomer
晩春: (ばんしゅん) - late spring; third month of the lunar calendar
晩涼: (ばんりょう) - evening cool; cool evening air
晩熟: (ばんじゅく) - late crops; a late bloomer
晩生: (ばんせい) - slow growth; slow ripening
晩生植物: (ばんせいしょくぶつ) - slow grower
晩白柚: (バンペイユ) - Citrus grandis; Citrus maxima
晩秋: (ばんしゅう) - late autumn (fall); ninth month of the lunar calendar
晩節: (ばんせつ) - late in life; one's later years
晩蒔き: (おそまき) - (ant: 早まき・はやまき) sowing late; doing late
晩酌: (banshaku) - beber em casa durante a refeição da noite, bebida na hora do jantar
晩餐会: (ばんさんかい) - banquet; dinner party
普く: (あまねく) - widely; generally; universally; far and wide
普アル茶: (プーアルちゃ) - Pu'er tea; Pu-erh tea
普偏: (ふへん) - (ant: 特殊) universal; general; ubiquitous; omnipresent
普免: (ふめん) - (abbr of 普通免許) standard driver's licence
普化宗: (ふけしゅう) - Fuke school (defunct sect of Zen Buddhism)
普及啓発: (ふきゅうけいはつ) - public awareness (e.g. publicity and education campaigns aimed at improving the health, environment, etc.)
普及版: (ふきゅうばん) - cheap popular edition
普及率: (ふきゅうりつ) - diffusion rate; rate of spread
普段: (fudan) - habitual, normal, cotidiano, habitual, comum; normalmente, geralmente, normalmente, habitualmente, sempre
普段から: (ふだんから) - on a routine basis; regularly; habitually
普段着: (ふだんぎ) - casual wear; ordinary clothes; everyday clothes; home wear
普洱茶: (プーアルちゃ) - Pu'er tea; Pu-erh tea
普茶: (ふさ) - entertaining people by serving tea (esp. in the Obaku school of Zen)
普茶料理: (ふさりょうり) - Chinese-style vegetarian cuisine (popular in the Edo period)
普請: (ふしん) - building/construction; group effort by Buddhist practitioners/group activities by a community (e.g. cleaning, etc.)
普賢延命菩薩: (ふげんえんめいぼさつ) - image of the Samantabhadra of long life (with either two or twenty arms, usu. on a white elephant)
普賢菩薩: (ふげんぼさつ) - Samantabhadra (Bodhisattva); Fugen; Puxian
普辺: (ふへん) - (ant: 特殊) universal; general; ubiquitous; omnipresent
普通: (futsuu) - geral, comum, usual; normalmente, geralmente, normalmente; realmente
普通でない: (ふつうでない) - abnormal; not the rule; not customary
普通ではない: (ふつうではない) - abnormal; not the rule; not customary
普通列車: (ふつうれっしゃ) - regular train; local train; train that stops at every station
普通孔針: (ふつうあなはり) - needle with a normal eye
普通教育: (ふつうきょういく) - general education
普通文: (ふつうぶん) - normal style of writing/modern Japanese text; text written in literary style with mixed kanji and kana (until the Taisho era)
普通社債: (ふつうしゃさい) - straight bond; SB
普通科: (ふつうか) - infantry; general education curriculum
普通穴針: (ふつうあなはり) - needle with a normal eye
普通紙複写機: (ふつうしふくしゃき) - plain paper copier
普通自動車: (ふつうじどうしゃ) - standard-sized automobile; full-sized car; ordinary vehicle
普通課程: (ふつうかてい) - general education curriculum
普通車: (ふつうしゃ) - standard size car; (ant: グリーン車) ordinary carriage (train)/second-class carriage
